entry.title: Notes from Podcast
entry.summary: Design doc: Brief description of problem and goal PRD link High level architecture Proposed interfaces Risks Timelines Launch plan Credibility = track record of results Show understanding and listening well Being reliable with executing Be excited where you are You can have your own career…
entry.content:
Design doc:
  • Brief description of problem and goal
  • PRD link
  • High level architecture
  • Proposed interfaces
  • Risks
  • Timelines
  • Launch plan
Credibility = track record of results
  • Show understanding and listening well
  • Being reliable with executing
  • Be excited where you are

You can have your own career plan:

I need to work on these competencies
Work on projects to hit competencies
Focus on developing skills


Influence = input you give to your org to affect its output
  • Feedback
  • disagreement
  • sharing pov
  • Getting buy in

Why should people listen to you?

Who you are
How you present ideas
Should have key relationships
How can i be a better partner?
